department.dept_long_name: Department of Romance Languages and Literatures

course.title: Cultural History and Nation-Making: 1870-1920
course.description: Introduction to the cultural history of Italy from the Risorgimento to the dawn of Fascism: war, work, education, music, fashion, festivals and cooking. Students will explore the interaction between literary texts and other cultural forms.
course.notes: Conducted in Italian or English depending on enrollments.
